QAPair.Question: What is (are) Anti-reflux surgery - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You had surgery to treat your gastroesophageal reflux disease ( GERD ). GERD is a condition that causes food or liquid to come up from your stomach into your esophagus (the tube that carries food from your mouth to your stomach). Now that you're going home, be sure to follow your surgeon's instructions on how to take care of yourself.
